snippet.title: Brews & Bastards - Steam Next Fest Trailer
snippet.description:
Brews & Bastards is an intoxicating 1 to 4 player co-op dungeon crawler with an over-the-top fantasy tavern theme.
Play the demo during Steam Next Fest, from Feb 5th to the 12th! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2556240/Brews__Bastards/

In the demo you'll descend into the corrupted cellars and fight through waves of drunken demons before facing off against the Drunken Knight in a gigantic game of beer pong. 

Select from a group of boozy heroes, each with their own distinct weapons and abilities, before travelling into a series of brewery themed dungeons, filled with magical brews, devious traps and powerful artifacts.
Coming 2024.

Twitter - https://twitter.com/BrewsNBastards
Discord - https://discord.gg/2vjFq3ZxBb
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2556240/Brews__Bastards/
Linktree - https://linktr.ee/brewsandbastards
Website - https://munestudio.net/
